data.title: AlticeUSA
data.text:
Connectivity

Powered by our advanced Fiber Network, Optimum delivers Internet, TV, Phone, and Mobile services connecting millions of people and businesses across the country anytime, anywhere.

News

The best in local and international news through News 12 and i24NEWS keep viewers informed and engaged to what matters to them.

Advertising

Advanced advertising and analytics solutions from Optimum Media deliver multiscreen campaigns for advertisers to reach their audiences and grow their businesses.

Optimum Announces the Launch of Entertainment TV, a Brand-New Internet TV Package Available Exclusively on Optimum Stream, Providing Customers with Choice and Flexibility. Click here to learn more.

Optimum Business and the Southwest Louisiana Economic Development Alliance Announce the Founding of the L.L.B. Grants. Click here to learn more.
